channel.title: How can i change the picture? Using pk planet source
channel.description: okay so i made a picture and want to make it the login screen for my server. im using pk planet source and want to know it just seems it wont let me. any suggestions?

item.title: How can i change the picture? Using pk planet source
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

go to your client folder and look for sprits and then find the original picture for the login screen and then change it. then find compile in your clients folder and compile. make sure to get the latest JDK java.

GOOD LUCK

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the picture? Using pk planet source
